# academic-avocado-namer

Little project to use for naming things with better names than guids

## module main

```
python -m academic_avocado_namer
```

## local development

```
pip install -e .
```

## run tests:

```
pip install -e .
pytest
```

## Example API usage

```
>>> from academic_avocado_namer import generate_name
>>> generate_name()
```


## Example output

```
vain-viper
nocturnal-nightingale
annual-alligator
ultimate-unicorn
careless-chicken
aggressive-armadillo
deafening-dolphin
worrisome-wasp
whopping-woodcock
bright-butterfly
truthful-toad
masculine-mermaid
experienced-eagle
worse-worm
precious-penguin
precious-partridge
```
